Articles.Content: When i landed on the mun today to plant my flag am i the only one that felt the urge to say out loud... one small step for Kerbal.... one giant leap for kerbal kind?

When i landed on the mun today to plant my flag am i the only one that felt the urge to say out loud... one small step for Kerbal.... one giant leap for kerbal kind?

yes, yes you were

I said that the first ever time I got to the mun.

Even though they couldn't get out and walk yet.
